thread.title: Judge Blocks Texas’ Attempt to Cut Medicaid Funding to Planned Parenthood
thread.title_full: Judge Blocks Texas’ Attempt to Cut Medicaid Funding to Planned Parenthood

author: Theresa Avila
title: Judge Blocks Texas’ Attempt to Cut Medicaid Funding to Planned Parenthood
text: A federal judge in Texas ruled that the state cannot cut Medicaid funding from Planned Parenthood’s clinics. District Judge Sam Sparks delayed ruling on the matter in January but issued a preliminary injunction on Tuesday, effectively halting Texas’ plans to cut Medicaid dollars from Planned Parenthood. In his opinion,... More »
